name: ACE
text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/20/2017 12:03AM

Due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at 42 St-Port Authority Bus Terminal, the following service changes are in effect:

Southbound [A] trains are running express from 59 St-Columbus Circle to Canal St.

Southbound [E] trains are running express from 42 St-Port Authority Bus Terminal to Canal St.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 01/19/2017 11:34PM

Due to a water condition at 163 St-Amsterdam Av, the following service changes are in effect:

There is no [A] or [C] train service between 145 St and 175 St in both directions.

There is a [S] Shuttle train between 175 St and Inwood-207 St.

Some northbound [A] and [C] trains terminate at 59 St-Columbus Circle, 125 St or 145 St.

As an alternative, take the M4 and M5 buses.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Work
[E] World Trade Center-bound trains skip 23 St and Spring St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Jan 16 - 20

For service to these stations, take the [E] to 14 St or Canal St and transfer
to an uptown [A] or [E].

For service from these stations, take the [A] or [E] to W 4 St or 34 St-Penn Station
and transfer to a downtown [A] or [E].

Late Night, 10:45 PM Thu to 5 AM Fri, Jan 19 - 20

For service to this station, take the [E] or [F] to 71 Av and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [E] or Jamaica-bound [F].

For service from this station, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a
Manhattan-bound [E] or [F].




Planned Work
[A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains skip 50 St, 23 St and Spring St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Jan 16 - 20

For service to these stations, take the [A] to 42 St-Port Authority, 14 St or Canal St and transfer to an
uptown [A] or [E].

For service from 50 St, take the [E] to 42 St-Port Authority and transfer to the [A].

For service from 23 and Spring Sts, take the [A] or [E] to W 4 St or 34 St-Penn Station and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

name: L
text:
Planned Work
[L] No trains between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av

M14 buses provide alternate service
Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Jan 16 - 20

[L] service operates between 14 St-Union Sq and Rockaway Pkwy.

M14 buses make all [L] stops between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av.

• Transfer between [L] trains and M14 buses at 14 St-Union Sq.
• Use transfer ticket for connections between M14 buses and [A] [C] trains
at 8 Av-14 St or [F] trains at 6 Av-14 St.

Note: Additional overnight M14 bus service will be provided between 8 Av and 1 Av.

name: NQR
text:
Planned Work
[R] No service at Whitehall St, Court St, Jay St-MetroTech and DeKalb Av
Trains skip Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St in both directions

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Jan 16 - 20

For Court St and Jay St-MetroTech, use the nearby Borough Hall [2] [4] Station.

For DeKalb Av, take the [D] [N] [Q] instead, or [2] [4] at nearby Nevins St.

For skipped stations, take the [D] or [N].

or the [D] [N] at 36 St.
